title: White Wine Frozen Yogurt Recipe
full_text:
White Wine Frozen Yogurt Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Churning/Freezing Time
2 hrs 30 mins
Total
2 hrs 35 mins
Serves
6
to 8 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
cups
full-fat Greek yogurt
, cold
3/4
cup
sugar
3/4
cup
dry white wine
, cold
Lemon juice
, to taste
Salt
, to taste
Directions
In a large bowl, whisk yogurt and sugar together until sugar is dissolved. Stir in wine with lemon juice and salt to taste (start with 1/4 teaspoon of each).
Transfer to an ice cream maker and churn according to manufacturer's instructions. Serve immediately for soft serve, or freeze 2 to 3 hours for a firmer consistency.
Special Equipment
Ice cream maker

The Best Frozen Yogurt Is the One You Make Yourself
